DOC.brief_summary: This single multiple ascend dose study healthy male female ( non-child bearing potential ) Japanese White volunteer , assess safety , tolerability , blood urine drug level FosD . FosD develop treatment rheumatoid arthritis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Safety , Tolerability , Blood Urine Drug Levels Fostamatinib Disodium ( FosD ) Healthy Japanese White Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female ( nonchildbearing potential ) Japanese subject White subject ( origin Europe , Middle East , North Africa ) Body mass index ( BMI ) 17 27 kg/m2 weigh least 45 kg 100 kg History presence respiratory , GI , renal , hepatic , hematological , lymphatic , neurological , cardiovascular , psychiatric , musculoskeletal , genitourinary , immunological , dermatological , connective tissue diseases disorder Any clinically significant illness , acute infection , know inflammatory process , medical/surgical procedure trauma within 4 week first administration investigational product Smoking excess 5 cigarette per day equivalent within 30 day Day 1 Use prescription overthecounter drug within 2 week first administration investigational product
